tool_description: Unofficial and robust API for the PS4 Russian Store
name: PlayStation4API
title: PlayStation4API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Find a game in PS4 Store

api_list.name: Details
api_list.description: Get full information about a game

required_parameters.name: hashcode
required_parameters.description: Hashcode is the unique id of the game

api_list.name: PlayStation Plus
api_list.description: Get the current free PSPlus games
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://playstation4api.p.rapidapi.com/api/ru/ps-plus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "playstation4api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: On Sale
api_list.description: Get a full list of current sales in the PS4 Store

api_list.name: Random game
api_list.description: Retrieve a random game from PS4 Store

api_list.name: Game by genre
api_list.description: Find a game by its genre

required_parameters.name: genre
required_parameters.description: Genres include: action, arcade, horror, puzzle,  casual, chill, strategy, fps, music, unique, adventure, racing, family, sport, rpg, simulator, fighting
